name: Galactic Death Spree
description:
The alien-rogue alliance threatens the galactic way of life. Your services are required to purge the overrun nebular regions using Extreme Prejudice, an experimental fighter equipped with weapon switching abilities and a detachable side-ship. 

Salvage destroyed ships to charge an accompanying support-ship for real time upgrades and mega-weapons. 

Do not fail the galaxy in this hour of greatest need!

Controls: Mouse controls ship movement. No clicking required. WASD keys control the detachable side-ship (optional; useful for local co-op ). 

Other facts: There are a lot of (procedural) levels/sprees. You may adjust game difficulty before each spree. Ship attributes may be improved by applying bonuses given on level completion. Best to stay home and play (free) games :)

Version: 0.1.3.6. Working on a million things, especially sound. Will be updating frequently. Change in attributes (saved data) will be lost on update.
